caption.p: Blinded analysis of patient plasmas and graphic presentation of reciprocal IC 50 values. The blinded samples (T1â€“T7) were serial diluted, incubated with CHIKV- or MAYV-pseudotyped vector particles, and evaluated for neutralizing activity by detection of relative luciferase activities as a percentage of the untreated control. IC 50 values were calculated using the GraphPad Prism 7.04 software and the reciprocal IC 50 value are depicted for samples analyzed with CHIKV-pseudotyped vectors (red) or MAYV-pseudotyped vectors (blue).
